alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 01 at 3:05PM CDT until May 02 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS THIS AFTERNOON AND TUESDAY AFTERNOON... .Gusty northwest winds continue today and through tomorrow, with low to critically low relative humidities expected. Wind gusts will be highest today and tomorrow morning with gusts of 25 to 40 mph calming to gusts of 20 to 30 mph tomorrow afternoon. Low relative humidities less than 25 percent are expected, driest tomorrow afternoon when some relative humidities as low as 15 percent are possible across north-central Minnesota. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTH CENTRAL AND NORTHEAST MINNESOTA... The National Weather Service in Duluth has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In Minnesota, Koochiching, North St. Louis, North Itasca, Central St. Louis, South Itasca, Northern Aitkin, South Aitkin, Carlton and South St. Louis and Pine. * WINDS...North 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and become difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; South Itasca
